main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed traveling northeast from San Francisco to Balboa, Panama Canal on August 7, 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as a flaming aerial body, possibly resembling a ship,The object disappeared quickly before the observer could fully describe it,Several witnesses confirmed seeing a glowing body that appeared half the size of the setting sun,It was reported that the object emitted rays or sparks from its upper rear side,The military investigators originally considered it a meteorological phenomenon but recognized the witnesses' descriptions as notable.
witness description: Engineer on duty and US Air Force personnel reported the sighting.
